Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, 75th and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie and  47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie and  47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive and 35th then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 35th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
